job.title: Senior Data Scientist-Supply Chain
job.description: <p>One of the most recognized brands in the world is looking to hire a Senior Data Scientist to join their Advanced Analytics team focused on direct-to-consumer business. </p><p><br></p><p>The Senior Data Scientist will collaborate with a team of data scientists and business stakeholders to clearly communicate meaningful insights to internal audiences. This person will have the ability to tell a story with data.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;Responsibilities:</p><p><br></p><ul><li><span>Play a crucial role in understanding their customers through detailed analysis</span></li><li><span>Develop statistical/econometric methods, machine learning techniques and big data solutions to forecast consumer demand and determine optimal level of investment in various stages of the supply chain.&nbsp;</span></li><li>Assess business requirements and constraints to make trade-off recommendations between speed and accuracy of alternative solution approaches.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</li><li>Identify and apply appropriate methods to acquire, explore, cleanse, and fuse data from different sources.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</li><li>Support the adoption of analytic products through effective storytelling and collaboration with key partners.</li><li>Partner with Demand and Supply Management as well as Data Science and Engineering</li></ul><p><br></p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>Required:</p><p><br></p><ul><li>5-10+ years of related Analytic/ Data Science experience</li><li>MS in Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, Computer Science or related field </li><li>Expert live Python, SQL, Machine Learning and Predictive Modeling</li><li>Ability to tell a story with data</li></ul>
